answers.answer: There are a number of reasons for why this may be happening... stress, diabetes, pregnancy, etc. It's hard to say what it might be for your specific case because I don't know a whole lot of info on your background. If you think it is a problem, then talk to your doctor. They can do some testing and find out what is going on.

to make it more clear..i never had this problem before..it all started when i held in my urine for hours..i'm not pregnant thats for sure..stress maybe..my life was normal before..could it be that my sphincter muscle is loose?? if so is there a cure?thank you

I would make an appointment with your doctor. Do you have a good diet? If not, I would ask to be checked for diabetes. You don't have to be overweight to have it. I'm skinny myself and have pre-diabetes, very close to that line. Also, just to let you know, the sphincter muscle is only for your anus. The muscle for holding your urine is your pelvic floor muscle. You can try doing kegel exercises and see if that helps. That may be good to do no matter, what. Though I would still make the doctors appointment and see what they say. If you have diabetes, it isn't something you should ignore.

i cant say i have a good diet since i eat anything.im skinny too..i was thinking that myself.to check if i have diabetes.ouh thank you for correcting me.i started doing kegel exercise already.its only been a week since i started.and i'll go to the doctors soon.thank you.you really helped =)

If you had a muscle problem you would have problems with leaking urine. I would get an A1C test done which checks your sugar level average for the last three months. One of the signs of pre-diabetes (which i also have) and diabetes is frequent urination which you have if you are going every 2 hours or so. The body is trying to get rid of excess sugar in the body. See a doctor about this.

i dont think i have the problem with leaking urine.ive been to a doctor before during June but it didnt help at all.im going to try a new doctor.i do go every 2 hours or sometimes it could be like every 30mins twice if i drink more.
sorry..the post above was suppose to be for grendslori if im not mistaken

question: im an 18 year old girl.still studying in college.what happen is that when i was15 years old i had the habit of holding in my urine for continous hours during sleeping.it is because im lazy to wake up and go to the toilet.i kept repeating this for almost 1 year if im not mistaken.now i keep urinating every 2 hours even if i dont drink.what is actually going on? please help me
title: frequency of urinating
